alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Carroll; Columbiana; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Monroe; Noble; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 6:57PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT GUERNSEY...MONROE...NORTHEASTERN COSHOCTON...CARROLL...TUSCARAWAS...NOBLE...HARRISON...JEFFERSON... COLUMBIANA...BELMONT...WESTERN BEAVER...GREENE...WESTERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE...OHIO...WETZEL...MARSHALL... BROOKE...WESTERN MONONGALIA...MARION AND HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EST... At 656 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near North Canton to near Middlebourne. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Winds have a history of causing power outages. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Weirton, Fairmont, Steubenville, New Philadelphia, Washington, Dover, Salem, East Liverpool, Cambridge, Moundsville, and Martins Ferry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 179 and 225. Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 18. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 18 and 20, and between mile markers 34 and 93. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 5, between mile markers 7 and 27, and between mile markers 38 and 39. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 131 and 147, and between mile markers 157 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Carroll; Columbiana; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Monroe; Noble; Tuscarawas
